share on x sb sue barrett. jun 10 at 7:16 pm sorry to hear about sweet norma. she was the best pianist trinity baptist church ever had and she taught my daughter gail nazworth piano lessons. she live a great inspirational life and i am so grateful to your family for such good care. i always got a letter informing me of the years activities etc. god bless you and comfort you. love to all, sue nazworth barrett in amarillo. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x jun 10 at 4:57 pm spring has sprung mixed basket was purchased for the family of norma beard sutton. share on x more memories... visitation. jun 11. 9:30 am - 10:30 am stewart family funeral home7525 old jacksonville hwy. tyler, tx, us, 75703. get order flowers now for norma's visitation service. jun 12. 10:30 am stewart family funeral home7525 old jacksonville hwy. tyler, tx, us, 75703. get order flowers now for norma's service wall 365 days of grief support. subscribe stewart family funeral home website designed by funeralone view general pricing list contact obituaries about store
